name: Francesco Agati
body:
> Ruby lover, Javascript fanatic, Haxe typed,  Php bad designer, Lisp hacker

### Personal projects
[Syringo - dependency injection for Haxe](http://francescoagati.github.com/Syringo)

[jQuery.declare - an implementation of scope activerecord in jquery for declarative scopes](http://francescoagati.github.com/jquery.declare)

[opal-di - a dependency injector for opal inspired to pimple]
(http://francescoagati.github.com/opal-di)
